dedup_process: Stage 1 + Tech Signals + Spiritual Signals merged and deduplicated

new_signals.title: CRISPR Epigenetic Editing Breakthrough: Gene Activation Without DNA Cutting
new_signals.summary: UNSW Sydney researchers developed a new form of CRISPR technology that activates genes by removing methyl groups without cutting DNA, potentially making gene therapy safer. This epigenetic editing approach avoids cancer risks associated with DNA cutting and has been published in Nature Communications.

new_signals.title: Real-Time Plant Respiration Monitoring Technology
new_signals.summary: Scientists created a breakthrough method to watch plants breathe in real-time and high definition, tracking exact carbon and water exchange with air. This could unlock development of crops that grow smarter, stronger, and more drought-resistant.

new_signals.title: Quantum Computing Hardware-Software Co-Design Strategy (SurgeQ)
new_signals.summary: New research on SurgeQ presents a hardware-software co-design strategy for superconducting quantum platforms employing coupling-strengthened faster two-qubit gates while mitigating crosstalk through tailored scheduling. Accepted by DATE 2026 conference.

new_signals.title: Quantum Computing Accelerates Machine Learning Training Time
new_signals.summary: Quantum computing is demonstrating ability to speed up machine learning algorithms and reduce time needed to process vast datasets. Large language models like those used by ChatGPT could potentially be trained in hours rather than weeks through quantum acceleration.

new_signals.title: AI Economic Impact Measurement: High-Frequency Dashboards Emerge
new_signals.summary: Stanford HAI experts predict 2026 will see emergence of high-frequency AI economic dashboards with monthly updates rather than years-later data. This follows their 'Canaries in the Coal Mine' work with ADP showing early-career workers in AI-exposed occupations experiencing weaker outcomes.

new_signals.title: AI Sovereignty Movement Gains Global Momentum
new_signals.summary: AI sovereignty will gain huge steam in 2026 as countries try to show independence from AI providers and the United States political system. This trend reflects growing concerns about technological independence and national security.

new_signals.title: IMF World Economic Outlook Update (January 2026)
new_signals.summary: IMF scheduled press briefing for World Economic Outlook Update on January 19, 2026 at 10:30 AM CET. Previous projections indicated global growth at 3.3% for both 2025 and 2026, below historical average of 3.7%, with global headline inflation declining to 3.5% in 2026.

new_signals.title: Renewables to Surpass Coal as Largest Electricity Source by Mid-2026
new_signals.summary: IEA Renewables 2025 report forecasts renewables will surpass coal by end of 2025 or mid-2026 at latest to become largest source of global electricity generation. Share of renewables in global electricity generation projected to rise from 32% in 2024 to 43% by 2030.

new_signals.title: EU Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) Enters Full Implementation
new_signals.summary: Starting January 1, 2026, the EU's Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism moves from transitional period into definitive application phase, placing charges on certain imports of carbon-intensive goods including steel, cement, aluminum, and fertilizers.

new_signals.title: Carbon Engineering's Stratos: World's Largest Direct Air Capture Plant
new_signals.summary: By 2026, Carbon Engineering's Stratos facility in Texas will capture between 500,000 and 1 million tons of CO2 annually, making it the world's largest DAC (Direct Air Capture) plant. Three companies dominate carbon capture: Climeworks, Carbon Engineering, and SLB Capturi.

new_signals.title: CFR Identifies Five Major Foreign Policy Trends for 2026
new_signals.summary: Council on Foreign Relations experts identified five major foreign policy trends shaping 2026, including critical minerals geopolitics, continuing change in regional security architectures, and intensifying geopolitical rivalry with uncertain progress on U.S. critical-minerals supply chain security.

new_signals.title: South Korea Gen Z Shows 33% Population Share, MZ Generation Dominance
new_signals.summary: MZ Generation (Millennials and Gen Z combined) makes up 33% of South Korea's population as of November 2025. Over half of Gen MZ live in or around the Seoul metropolitan area. Characterized by YOLO (prioritizing personal happiness), 'meaning out' (value-based consumption), and 'flex' (consumption to show existence).

new_signals.title: Gen Z Gravitates Toward Intentional Living and Emotional Grounding in 2026
new_signals.summary: Major theme for Gen Z in 2026 is intentional living and emotional grounding, with the generation gravitating toward slower, more meaningful experiences that provide emotional comfort and stability. This represents a shift away from fast-paced consumption patterns.

new_signals.title: Wellness Trends 2026: Nervous System Regulation and Soft Wellness
new_signals.summary: 2026 wellness trends focus on stimulating the vagus nerve for stress regulation, mind-body practices around nervous system regulation and emotional balance. Movement away from hustle culture toward 'soft wellness' - a gentler, more mindful approach to health. Includes sound baths, astrology sessions, moon ceremonies.

new_signals.title: NASA Selects Technology for Habitable Worlds Observatory
new_signals.summary: NASA announced selection of industry proposals to advance technologies for Habitable Worlds Observatory concept - the first mission that would directly image Earth-like planets around stars like our Sun and study their atmospheres for signs of life.

new_signals.title: First-Ever ISS Medical Evacuation: Crew-11 Returns Early
new_signals.summary: NASA returning four astronauts to Earth early from ISS due to medical concern, marking first time in U.S. history and ISS program that a space mission has been cut short due to medical issue. SpaceX Crew-11 undocking targeted for no earlier than Jan 14, 2026.

new_signals.title: Artemis II Lunar Flyby Mission Set for February 2026
new_signals.summary: NASA announced earliest launch window for Artemis II is Feb 6, 2026, with 12 possible dates from February-April. Mission will send astronauts around the Moon on ten-day lunar flyby, first crewed lunar flyby since Apollo program.

new_signals.title: xAI Raises Record $20 Billion Funding Round
new_signals.summary: First full week of 2026 brought a $20 billion funding round for Elon Musk's xAI, marking one of the largest venture deals ever recorded. Signals continued massive capital deployment in AI infrastructure.

new_signals.title: AI Startups Dominate VC: 58% of Funding in Megarounds Over $500M
new_signals.summary: More than half of all VC dollars and 36% of total deals now flow to AI companies. Two out of every three VC dollars went to AI ventures in 2025. In AI sector, 58% of funding was in megarounds of $500 million or more, with 2025 AI startup funding reaching $131.5B, growing 52% while non-AI funding dropped 10%.

new_signals.title: Boston Dynamics Atlas: Electric Humanoid Robot Deployments Begin
new_signals.summary: Boston Dynamics unveiled all-new Electric Atlas at CES 2026, a high-performance enterprise-grade humanoid robot for industrial tasks from material handling to order fulfillment. 2026 deployments fully allocated, with initial fleets shipping to Hyundai's RMAC and Google DeepMind.

new_signals.title: Hyundai Plans 30,000 Humanoid Robots Annual Production by 2028
new_signals.summary: Hyundai announced at CES 2026 plans to start using humanoid robots in its factories and is building production system that could produce 30,000 robots annually by 2028. Part of broader AI Robotics Strategy to lead human-centered robotics era.

new_signals.title: World's First Production Solid-State EV Battery: 5-Minute Charging
new_signals.summary: Donut Lab unveiled production-ready solid-state EV battery at CES 2026 that recharges fully in five minutes. Battery has 400 Wh/kg energy density (double typical Tesla battery) and can be fully charged in 5 minutes for up to 100,000 cycles. Verge Motorcycles TS Pro to be first production vehicle with all-solid-state battery in Q1 2026.

new_signals.title: CATL Sodium-Ion Batteries to Enter Mass Production in 2026
new_signals.summary: Battery market leader CATL announced commercial production at scale of sodium-ion batteries starting in 2026 for battery swapping systems, passenger vehicles, commercial vehicles, and stationary storage. Sodium-based batteries promise better low-temperature performance, improved safety, and lower costs than lithium.

new_signals.title: South Korea Semiconductor Exports Projected to Reach $188B in 2026
new_signals.summary: South Korea's semiconductor exports in 2026 projected to reach $188 billion, an 11% increase compared to last year, marking new all-time high for second consecutive year. Korean chipmakers expected to increase spending on semiconductor manufacturing equipment by 27.2% to $29.66B.

new_signals.title: AI Integration Shifts from Pilot Projects to System-Wide Education Strategy
new_signals.summary: 2026 marks transition from experimental AI adoption to system-wide integration in education. AI shifting from pilot projects to natural part of daily classroom experiences, firmly cemented as essential part of institutional strategy. Hyper-personalized learning becoming standard with AI adapting instruction based on individual readiness.

new_signals.title: US Stablecoin Regulation: GENIUS Act Implementation by July 2026
new_signals.summary: GENIUS Act creates federal regulatory framework for stablecoin issuers, mandating requirements around reserves, audits, and financial integrity. Regulators expected to promulgate final implementing regulations by July 2026, ahead of January 2027 deadline to bring GENIUS into force.

new_signals.title: Federal Reserve 'Skinny' Master Accounts for Fintech by Q4 2026
new_signals.summary: On December 19, Fed issued RFI on 'skinny' master accounts providing access to Federal Reserve payment rails while limiting features like discount window access. FRB's goal is to have skinny master accounts available by Q4 2026, enabling fintech access to Fed infrastructure.

new_signals.title: Labor Market Enters 'Low-Hire, Low-Fire' Era with 11.7% Jobs Automatable
new_signals.summary: November MIT study found 11.7% of jobs could already be automated using AI. 2026 predicted as 'year of agents' as software expands from making humans productive to automating work itself. Labor market forecast for 'low-hire, low-fire' trend with companies hoarding talent while using AI to fill gaps. Jobs with more AI exposure seeing slower job growth, especially among younger workers.

new_signals.title: AI Workers Save 2 Hours Daily but Only 25% Receive Formal Training
new_signals.summary: Workers report saving average of two hours per day using AI tools, yet only 25% receive formal AI training from employers. Workers with AI expertise can command salaries up to 56% higher than peers, more than double the premium from year before. Highlights significant training gap organizations need to address in 2026.

new_signals.title: US-China Tech De-escalation: Rare Earth Export Controls Suspended
new_signals.summary: Beijing retaliated to US semiconductor controls with rare-earth export licensing requirements. Escalation jolted global markets, forcing emergency consultations in Busan where both sides agreed to tentative one-year suspension of measures. US-China relations entering 2026 with paradox: trade thawing in soybeans/metals while tech war over AI chips hardening.

new_signals.title: China Reduces Import Tariffs on 935 Items Targeting Tech and Healthcare
new_signals.summary: Beginning January 1, 2026, China reduced import duties on 935 items to levels below Most-Favored-Nation rates. 2026 tariff schedule includes reductions on critical components for advanced and emerging technologies, renewable energy, and healthcare. Signals pragmatic trade policy shift.

new_signals.title: USC Stem Cell Implant Trial for Vision Restoration in Macular Degeneration
new_signals.summary: Scientists at USC launching new trial to test tiny stem cell implant that could restore vision in people with advanced dry macular degeneration. Represents breakthrough in regenerative medicine for age-related vision loss.

new_signals.title: AI Sleep Analysis Predicts Future Disease Risk from One Night's Data
new_signals.summary: Stanford researchers developed AI that can predict future disease risk using data from just one night of sleep, analyzing detailed physiological signals across brain, heart, and breathing. Represents advancement in preventive medicine and early disease detection.

new_signals.title: Obesity Drug Access Inequality: Two-Tier System Emerges
new_signals.summary: King's College London research published January 4, 2026 highlights that breakthrough obesity drugs (GLP-1) are not accessible to everyone, raising concerns about two-tier system where wealth rather than medical need determines access to care. Critical social equity issue in healthcare.

new_signals.title: FDA to Approve First Regulatory T Cell Therapy by Spring 2026
new_signals.summary: As soon as spring 2026, FDA could approve first regulatory T cell therapy to prevent graft-versus-host disease in bone marrow transplant recipients. Represents major advancement in cell-based immunotherapy.

new_signals.title: AI 기반 정신건강 앱 시장 급성장 - 연 15% 성장률로 2030년 156억 유로 예상
new_signals.summary: 정신건강 앱 시장이 현재 70억 유로에서 2030년 156억 유로로 성장 예상. AI 기반 챗봇과 가상 코치가 치료사 부족 문제 해결. Flourish, Woebot, Wysa 등 주요 플랫폼이 무작위 대조 실험(RCT)을 통해 효과성 입증 중.

new_signals.title: 미국 일리노이·네바다주, AI 정신건강 치료 금지 법안 통과 - 규제 강화 추세
new_signals.summary: 일리노이와 네바다주가 AI 정신건강 치료를 금지하는 법안 통과. 유타주는 챗봇에 제한 조치. 스탠포드 연구에서 AI 치료 챗봇이 효과 부족하고 위험한 응답 및 낙인 조장 가능성 발견. 미국 청소년 540만 명(13%)이 이미 AI를 정신건강 지원에 사용 중.

new_signals.title: RENPHO x Headspace 협업 아이 마사지기 출시 - 웰니스 기술과 마음챙김 융합
new_signals.summary: 웰니스 기술 기업 RENPHO와 명상 앱 Headspace가 협업하여 Eyeris Zen 아이 마사지기 출시. 물리적 웰니스 디바이스와 디지털 마음챙김 콘텐츠의 통합 제품. 하드웨어와 소프트웨어 융합형 웰니스 솔루션 트렌드.

new_signals.title: 실로시빈(환각버섯 성분) FDA 승인 임박 - 2026-27년 치료제 허가 전망
new_signals.summary: Compass Pathways의 합성 실로시빈이 2026-27년 FDA 신약 승인 신청 예정. 치료 저항성 우울증 치료제로 개발 중. MDMA는 2024년 FDA 승인 거부당했으나, 실로시빈은 내면적 경험 중심으로 승인 가능성 높음. Usona Institute도 2024년 3상 시험 시작.

new_signals.title: 웰니스 관광 시장 2027년 1.4조 달러 돌파 - 일반 관광의 2배 성장률
new_signals.summary: 웰니스 관광 시장이 2027년 1.4조 달러 돌파 예상. 풀문 세레머니, 사운드 배스, 명상 리트릿 등 영적 경험 중심 여행 급증. '조용한 휴가(quietcations)', 스타배싱(starbathing), 다크 리트릿, 샤머니즘 등 깊은 영성 체험 프로그램 확산.

new_signals.title: 영성 웰니스 앱 시장 2035년까지 연평균 14.66% 성장 - 99억 달러 규모 전망
new_signals.summary: 영성 웰니스 앱 시장이 2026-2035년 연평균 14.66% 성장하여 2035년 99.1억 달러 도달 예상. 안드로이드 플랫폼이 최대 점유율. 명상, 요가, 감정 웰빙 앱 사용 급증. Isha Foundation의 'Miracle of Mind' 앱은 15시간 만에 100만 다운로드 달성(ChatGPT 초기 속도 초과).

new_signals.title: NVIDIA Launches Vera Rubin Platform - 5x Performance Leap for Agentic AI
new_signals.summary: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang unveiled the Vera Rubin AI platform at CES 2026, marking a paradigm shift in AI infrastructure. The platform delivers 5x performance increase over Blackwell architecture and 10x lower cost per token, specifically designed for agentic AI systems capable of autonomous reasoning and long-term planning. Production begins in H2 2026.

new_signals.title: D-Wave Acquires Quantum Circuits for $550M - Creating Full-Stack Quantum Leader
new_signals.summary: D-Wave announced $550M acquisition of Yale spin-out Quantum Circuits Inc., combining annealing and error-corrected gate-model quantum computing. QCI's dual-rail technology dramatically reduces physical resources needed for logical qubits. Product roadmap includes initial dual-rail system in 2026, 40-qubit version in 2027, and 181-qubit system in 2028. Creates only company addressing full quantum computing market.

new_signals.title: 2026 Declared Year of Quantum Security - FBI, CISA Launch Global Initiative
new_signals.summary: The Quantum Insider designated 2026 as Year of Quantum Security, launching January 12 in Washington D.C. with FBI, CISA, and NIST. Three focus areas: protecting quantum IP, post-quantum cryptography deployment, and global coordination. Includes regional summits across Americas, Europe, and Asia-Pacific throughout 2026, addressing urgent need to secure current data against future quantum decryption.

new_signals.title: Tower Semiconductor & LightIC Unveil Silicon Photonics Breakthrough for AI Data Centers
new_signals.summary: Tower Semiconductor and LightIC announced mass production of monolithic 4D FMCW LiDAR and optical interconnect chips on 300mm silicon photonics platform. Optical interconnects deliver 3.2 Tbps bandwidth with 5ns/meter latency, addressing the 'memory wall' limiting AI scaling. Promises 30% TCO reduction for massive AI clusters. Industry analysts predict silicon photonics will represent 40% of data center interconnects by 2028.

new_signals.title: Chinese AI Models Dominate Silicon Valley - DeepSeek, Qwen, GLM Gain Traction
new_signals.summary: MIT Technology Review predicts Silicon Valley will increasingly build products on Chinese LLMs including DeepSeek R1, Alibaba's Qwen, and Zhipu's GLM in 2026. These models offer cost advantages and customization capabilities that proprietary American models cannot match. Signals potential shift in AI value chain and questions about technology decoupling.

new_signals.title: CES 2026 Marks Shift to Physical AI - 9 Production-Ready Humanoid Robots Showcased
new_signals.summary: CES 2026 showcased breakthrough shift from demonstration to deployment in humanoid robotics, with 9 production-ready robots including Boston Dynamics Atlas, Unitree G1/H2/R1, LG CLOiD, AgiBot A2, NEURA 4NE1, SwitchBot Onero H1, EngineAI T800, and Fourier GR-3. Several already shipping (AgiBot: 5,000+ units). Represents transition from 'will they work?' to 'where should we deploy them?'

new_signals.title: AI-Powered Commerce Hits $263B in Holiday Sales - McKinsey Forecasts $3-5T by 2030
new_signals.summary: Salesforce reports AI-driven chatbots generated $263 billion in online purchases during 2025 holiday season. McKinsey projects agentic commerce (autonomous AI agents conducting transactions) will reach $3-5 trillion annually by 2030. Google Gemini and OpenAI ChatGPT launching shopping features. Represents fundamental shift in e-commerce interface from search/browse to conversational agents.

new_signals.title: 2nm Semiconductor Production Begins - 600+GB Memory Stacks Announced
new_signals.summary: First wave of 2nm processors hitting production lines in 2026, with breakthrough memory technologies enabling 600+GB on single stack. SK Hynix entered HBM4 mass production in September. Represents continued Moore's Law progression and convergence of logic and memory advances. Real surge in 2nm production expected throughout 2026.

new_signals.title: Memory Chip Prices Surge as AI Demand Drives Shortages - HBM4 Era Begins
new_signals.summary: Memory chip prices surged in 2025 and are likely to increase further in 2026 as demand for AI-crucial chips continues rising. SK Hynix completed HBM4 development and entered mass production stage in September. Semiconductor stocks rallied led by ASML, TSMC, and Samsung. Global semiconductor market forecast to reach $800B in 2026, up from $728B in 2025 (WSTS).

new_signals.title: Google DeepMind's AlphaEvolve Demonstrates LLMs Can Generate Novel Algorithms
new_signals.summary: Google DeepMind's AlphaEvolve demonstrated that LLMs can generate genuinely novel algorithms when paired with evolutionary systems. Multiple labs racing to replicate approach for solving math problems, drug discovery, and materials science. Represents potential paradigm shift from AI as pattern-matcher to AI as inventor. Variants include OpenEvolve and SinkaEvolve.
